deity.name: Lolth
deity.title: Demon Queen of Spiders
deity.text: Lolth is the chaotic evil god of shadow, lies, and spiders. Scheming and treachery are her commands, and her priests are a constant force of disruption in the mostly otherwise stable society of the evil drow. Though she is properly a god and not a demon, she is called Demon Queen of Spiders. She demands her followers:
► Do whatever it takes to gain and hold power.
► Rely on stealth and slander in preference to outright confrontation.
► Seek the death of elves and eladrin at every opportunity.

power.title: Drow Ecclesiastic
power.fluff: Lolth punishes those who escape her wiles

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy within range succeeds on a saving throw to end a condition

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target takes ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends).

power.title: Lolth's Cruel Sacrifice
power.fluff: You channel the goddess' blessing to save you from danger at an ally's expense

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy hits you with an attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You and the target teleport, swapping positions, and the target is hit by the triggering attack instead of you.
You or one ally adjacent to you (other than the target) can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to his or her healing surge value.

power.title: Spider Charmer
power.fluff: You draw upon Lolth's ability to command spiders and drow

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must be drow and at least 11th level.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: The target is dominated until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target cannot flank until the end of your next turn, and it grants combat advantage for the first attack made against it before the end of your next turn.
